resources.string: These preferences won\'t be available in final apps. These are made just for designers to check the multiple customization options IconShowcase can offer.
When using IconShowcase you can choose between 3 different drawer header styles.
When disabled, IconShowcase will show a solid color header.
IconShowcase offers 2 changelog styles: a text based one and an icons based one.
IconShowcase offers you the option to show some lists as cards instead of flat stuff.
When disabled, IconShowcase won\'t show app\'s name and version in the drawer\'s header.
IconShowcase offers many other additional options you can setup while building your app. Tap here to check them.

string-array.name: configurations_list
string-array.item: These features can be additionally configured when using the dashboard source:
Showcase your apps in main section.
Setup what you want users to be able to configure.

string-array.name: additional_features_list
string-array.item: Additionally, IconShowcase offers some other features:
Kustom Live Wallpapers and Kustom Widgets support.
Icon Requests limit: for example, X apps every Y minutes. Meaning users will be able to request X apps only every Y minutes.
App works as a gallery to pick icons or wallpapers and use them in other apps.
Dashboard translated to more than 7 languages.
